scripts.////////////////////////// - 3: COMMENT: ATTENTION!!! db:reset & db:reset-and-start will reset XREATE database
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.////////////////////////// - 4: COMMENT: Normal use scripts to migrate and start XREATE backend
